member.name: T:CarHandler.Car
member.summary: Represents a Car with properties and methods. Best used in WPF projects.

member.name: P:CarHandler.Car.ProductionYear
member.summary: The production year of the car

member.name: M:CarHandler.Car.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Represents a car with the given parameters as properties
member.param: The make of the car - e.g. Ford
The model of the car - e.g. Mustang
The paint color of the car - e.g. red
member.exception: productionYear represents a number lower than 1886, or greater than the current year.

member.name: M:CarHandler.Car.GetInfo
member.summary: Returns all the information of the car as a string.
member.returns: The string representation of all the information of the car

member.name: M:CarHandler.Car.StartCar
member.summary: A method trying to start the car.
member.returns: Returns true if the car did start, otherwise false.

member.name: M:CarHandler.Car.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the car in the format Make Model (ProductionYear)
member.returns: The string representation of the car
